title: Support Brand averages more damage dealt per game than Yasuo
body:
http://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo/Top

http://champion.gg/champion/Brand

Let that sink in for a minute

replies.body:
So, you are saying that a ranged mage who specializes in dealing AoE damage tends to deal more damage than a melee duelist who deals primarily single-target damage?

Shocking.  Truly shocking.

Ranged ***Support***. I'm not crying about Mid Brand. Support Brand with a {{item:2049}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}} (6600 gold) out-damages  a solo-laner with {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3072}} (9850 gold). You dont see a problem with this?

{{item:3151}} is so fucking noob trap

get {{item:3165}}  instead , cheaper more cdr MORE AP more mana and anti-heal passive against warlord adc
{{item:3116}} + {{item:3151}} was core on Brand even before they buffed it in the Mage update. It just synergizes too damn well with his passive and massive AoE damage
Maybe it has to do with the fact that brand hits multiple people and most people aren't going to go within a screen of {{item:3022}} {{item:3046}} yasuo

I don't see an issue with a single-target champion being outdamaged by an AoE champion.

Yasuo tend to excel in skirmishes and duels rather than teamfights.

Also, you didn't bother mentioning , {{item:3020}} {{item:3092}} or {{item:2301}}, which would have added to Brand's damage significantly and are core on him.

Well I could keep adding on items to Yas at that point too. {{item:2301}} really isnt helping his case considering it costs 2200 gold but it only offers 25 AP lol

If you're really stuck on the AoE thing, Support Brand average more damage per game than Anvia, Fiddle, Vlad, Orianna, and Wukong.

I wasn't adding items.

Generally, Brand is going to have Sorcerer Shoes and Eye of the Watchers or Frost Queen's Claim before finishing Rylai's Crystal Scepter and Liandry's Torment.

You were excluding them, which reduced the value of Brand's items and exaggerated the difference.

If anything, it was reducing the difference in gold values and providing an actual, realistic build.

Well if anything thats even worse. Support Brand doesnt have the gold income of a solo lane. Adding more gold on to his build becomes more and more unrealistic. Also, Brand not finishing {{item:2301}} is pretty common

More than Vayne too lmao

http://champion.gg/champion/Vayne
yeah he's op, i'm abusing him right now and only lose when my adc is garbage

Of course.

Brand does AoE damage, Yasuo is single target. Do the (2nd grade) math. Any control/sustained aoe mage (anivia, zyra, brand, taliyah) tends to have the highest damage on the team

Damage only matters if it accomplishes something.  If Brand does 30k damage in a game, but it's split among the team and 25k of that damage was against tanks who survived the damage easily, the Brand didn't accomplish a whole lot.  On the other hand, if a Yasuo only does 8k damage in a game, but all 8k were done to the enemy ADC during teamfights, killing the ADC each time, the Yasuo accomplished a lot.  Context matters a lot.
nah. its just about the player. not everyone is 100% the identical skilled like you're making it out to be.
That's like saying "Zyra deals the most damage in the game she's broken"

Can we stop with this "lol support did more damage {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3089}} {{item:2049}}" nonsense?

Like, no shit.  Playing support doesn't reduce your damage.  Playing low damage champions and building non-offensive items reduces your damage.

Oh I'm under no illusion that he's a "support". More or less calling bullshit on the amount of damage he does on a support's income. A "support" out damaging a solo laner with 6 CS and an XP deficit. Lol k
He is an (optional) support, just like veigar, zyra, vel'koz, morgana. Far better players than yourself are in agreement about it.

everyone deals more damage than yasuo cause hes dead all the time.
Or hes banned all the time so he cant deal damage if hes not in the game.
E: cuz aoe

yea what did you expect compare the ZERO mobility with 1 STUN THAT IS PRETTY DIFFICULT TO LAND
vs windwall 
/end thr... WAIT

AND vs unlimited mobility in certain situation and a aoe knock up that can last a full 3-4 seconds.

let THAT  sink in for a moment


wait what is that you said?
he gets double crit and a shield that makes trading nigh impossible....

fuk it im done trying to even let anything sink in at this point
